and you shall write<WH3789> on them all the words<WH1697> of this law,<WH8451> when you have passed over;<WH5674> that you may go in<WH935> to the land<WH776> which Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives<WH5414> you,<WH776> a land flowing<WH2100> with milk<WH2461> and honey,<WH1706> as Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of your fathers,<WH1> has promised you.<WH1696>

You shall build<WH1129> the altar<WH4196> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God<WH430> of uncut<WH8003> stones;<WH68> and you shall offer<WH5927> burnt offerings<WH5930> thereon to Yahweh<WH3068> your God:<WH430>
and you shall sacrifice<WH2076> peace offerings,<WH8002> and shall eat<WH398> there;<WH8055> and you shall rejoice before<WH6440> Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall write<WH3789> on the stones<WH68> all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> very<WH3190> plainly.<WH874>"

Moses<WH4872> and the priests<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> spoke<WH1696> to all Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "Keep silence,<WH5535> and listen,<WH8085> Israel:<WH3478> this day<WH3117> you have become<WH1961> the people<WH5971> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God.<WH430>
You shall therefore obey<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of Yahweh<WH3068> your God,<WH430> and do<WH6213> his commandments<WH4687> and his statutes,<WH2706> which I command<WH6680> you this day.<WH3117>"
Moses<WH4872> commanded<WH6680> the people<WH5971> the same day,<WH3117> saying,<WH559>

"These shall stand<WH5975> on Mount<WH2022> Gerizim<WH1630> to bless<WH1288> the people,<WH5971> when you have passed over<WH5674> the Jordan:<WH3383> Simeon,<WH8095> and Levi,<WH3878> and Judah,<WH3063> and Issachar,<WH3485> and Joseph,<WH3130> and Benjamin.<WH1144>
These shall stand<WH5975> on Mount<WH2022> Ebal<WH5858> for the curse:<WH7045> Reuben,<WH7205> Gad,<WH1410> and Asher,<WH836> and Zebulun,<WH2074> Dan,<WH1835> and Naphtali.<WH5321>
The Levites<WH3881> shall answer,<WH6030> and tell<WH6030> all the men<WH376> of Israel<WH3478> with a loud<WH7311> voice,<WH6963>

<WH779> 'Cursed is the man<WH376> who makes<WH6213> an engraved<WH6459> or molten image,<WH4541> an abomination<WH8441> to Yahweh,<WH3068> the work<WH4639> of the hands<WH3027> of the craftsman,<WH2796> and sets<WH7760> it up in secret.<WH5643>' All the people<WH5971> shall answer<WH6030> and say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who sets light<WH7034> by his father<WH1> or his mother.<WH517>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who removes<WH5253> his neighbor<WH7453>'s landmark.<WH1366>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who makes the blind<WH5787> to wander<WH7686> out of the way.<WH1870>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who deprives<WH5186> the foreigner,<WH1616> fatherless,<WH3490> and widow<WH490> of justice.<WH4941>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who lies<WH7901> with his father<WH1>'s wife,<WH802> because he has uncovered<WH1540> his father<WH1>'s skirt.<WH3671>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who lies<WH7901> with any kind of animal.<WH929>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'

<WH779> 'Cursed is he who lies<WH7901> with his sister,<WH269> the daughter<WH1323> of his father,<WH1> or the daughter<WH1323> of his mother.<WH517>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who lies<WH7901> with his mother-in<WH2859>-law.' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who strikes<WH5221> his neighbor<WH7453> in secret.<WH5643>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who takes<WH3947> a bribe<WH7810> to kill<WH5221> an innocent<WH5355> person.<WH5315>' All the people<WH5971> shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'
<WH779> 'Cursed is he who doesn't<WH6965> confirm the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451> to do<WH6213> them.<WH5971>' All the people shall say,<WH559> <WH543> 'Amen.'"
